biotools.summary: Software package implementing methods for imputation from summary statistics and accompanying data. The software takes as input 1000 Genomes reference haplotypes and summary association statistics at a typed set of SNPs from a GWAS or meta-analysis. It outputs summary association statistics at all 1000 Genomes variants.

bioschemas.name: ImpG-Summary
